message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your offer was a bit too lopsided. How about a 55/45 split in your favor?
Meet me in the middle of our previous offers, 58-42 is a good compromise.
Time is running out, and the deal is getting worse for both of us. I'm proposing a 52/48 split in your favor.  Let's close this deal.
